Description:
Learn how Copilot Studio and Power Automate work together to modernize automation. Explore agent flows and desktop flows (RPA) for scalable, secure solutions. See frameworks for integration, M365 Copilot as an entry point, and real-world demos showing agents and RPA delivering resilient automation for enterprise needs.
